HomePage.title: Travel Guide
HomePage.text: Travel Guide promises unforgettable discoveries by providing personalized destination recommendations to travel enthusiasts around the world.

descriptions.desc: Istanbul is famous for its historical and cultural richness. It hosts many significant landmarks on both sides of the Bosphorus.
descriptions.descc: The city of love, Paris, is famous for its historical and romantic atmosphere. It is home to iconic places like the Eiffel Tower and the Louvre Museum.
descriptions.desccc: London, known for its cultural diversity and historical heritage, houses important structures such as Big Ben and the Tower Bridge.
